2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Gods, who knew such a vile abcess lurked in the bedrock of the city. The very stone reeks of misery and despair.

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: A sad shrine kept by the lunatic and the lost. The last time I was here, I promised myself I would die beneath open sky. I have not changed my mind.
0.context: NodeContext: Trying to put Gale at ease by diminishing the grandeur of the Bhaal Temple.

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Nor should you. Far better to feel a cool breeze on your skin than whatever foul expirations blow through these halls.
